properties.Observatio: Its is made of stone and is not currently used.

properties.Observatio: There is group of springs. There is enough water to start a new water project.

properties.Observatio: Located on pitawala GND. A dam has been built across a spring-fed stream to collect water(L=3m, H=0.3m, W=0.3m). This dam is difficult to reach maintenance during the rainy season.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies

properties.Observatio: Located in the "Akkara 80" water catchment area. A canal is built to collect water from groups of springs and bring the water to the catch pit.  No water filtering system and boundaries.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies

properties.Observatio: Located in the "Akkara 80" water catchment area. A small dam is built across a flowing water stream to collect water. No water filtering system and boundaries.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies

properties.Observatio: Located in the Rajamale canal reserve land. There is a catch pit built with soil and stones, and there is a very bad smell in this area due to the poultry farm.
properties.Descriptio: Common excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus materials up to 30m. by Machinery. (This rate is excluding of transporting of machinery)/150mm x 225mm Random Rubble masonry work in 1:5 cement and sand mortar in structures/Plaste

properties.Observatio: Although part of this area has fairly large trees, the rest is pines trees have been planted. The villagers say that water is gradually becoming scarce due to this cultivation. Land is being illegally acquired because there are no boundaries.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies

properties.Observatio: An area with small bushes and no large trees. Land is being illegally acquired because there are no boundaries.
